role.descr: agent // mechanism, process, entity(imply to condition or property in that entity) //
entity receiving the biological property // gene product, celll, tissue, etc. //

example.text: Besides these side chain interactions with the 06-alkyl group, structure-based analysis of mutational data suggests that substitutions at Gly156 and Lys165 confer resistance to 06-BG through backbone distortions.

Human 06-alkylguaning-DNA alkyltransferase (AGT), which directly reverses endogenous alkylation at the 06-position of guanine, confers resistance to alkylation chemotherapies and is therefore an active anticancer drug target.

Increased AGT levels parallel acquired alkylation resistance in human tumors (Brent et al., 1985; Mattern et al., 1998), and transfection of AGT confers resistance to alkylation-sensitive cells (Kaina et al., 1991), demonstrating the role of AGT in therapeutic resistance.
Likewise, the introduced charge of Gly160His and Gly160Arg mutants would repel the benzyl group (Figure 3B), explaining the 06-BG resistance conferred by these mutations (Xu-Welliver et al., 1999a).

The data from the chimeras indicate that the difference is due to the absence of carboxyl sequences in Stat1, since the Stat5 phenotype of stability in the presence of MG132 can be conferred on Stat1 by simply replacing the C-terminus with that of Stat5.
example.arg: simply replacing the C-terminus with that of Stat5
the Stat5 phenotype of stability in the presence of MG132

example.text: The portion of the STATs conferring specificity for either a MAPK or a MAPK substrate kinase (MAPKAP) has not been determined.
example.arg: either a MAPK or a MAPK substrate kinase (MAPKAP)

example.text: In addition to clear loss-of-function mutations conferred by nonsense or frameshift alterations in the coding sequence or by splice variants, genetic screening has revealed a large number of missense codons with less obvious functional consequences.
example.arg: nonsense or frameshift alterations in the coding sequence or by splice variants

example.text: In itself, the gene variant does not confer an increased risk of diabetes.
